last_episode_to_air.name: In the Big House
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Penguins find a stranded spaceship. Investigating, they find that the ship is drained of all power and the Cow inhabitants need more fuel.

name: 3-2-1 Penguins!
overview: 3-2-1 Penguins. is a kids cartoon that teaches kids about the Bible and helps them learn different Bible verses with Zidgel, Midgel, Fidgel and Kevin with the help of Michelle and Jason.

episodes.name: Trouble on Planet Wait-Your-Turn
episodes.overview: Stuck with their eccentric English grandmother for an entire summer, Jason and Michelle Conrad are sure their vacation is a bust...until an amazing discovery in Ggrandmum's attic sends them on an adventure they'll never forget!

episodes.name: The Cheating Scales of Bullamanka
episodes.overview: Foul play is afoot on space-base Bullamanka. The conniving Lizard King has defeated the kindly Bandicoot King in a bizarre local game called "Squid-Tac-Toad!" But did he play by the rules? Michelle tries to beat the Lizard King at his own game. Can she keep the Bandicoot King - and her penguins friends - from going down the "gurgler"? What is a "gurgler," anyway?

episodes.name: The Amazing Carnival Complaining
episodes.overview: What starts out as a leisurely trip to an amusing carnival turns out to be anything but leisurely and amusing. Will Uncle Blobb succeed in his diabolical intergalactic real estate scheme? Will Jason and the Penguins be turned into "Seeds of Discontent?!?" And more importantly, do they have corn dogs in space?

episodes.name: Runaway Pride at Lightstation Kilowatt
episodes.overview: Michelle joins the Penguins on a mission to restore the beacon at Lightstation Kilowatt.  But will she be able to accomplish her mission before the F.S.S. Emperor's Pride crashes into a giant cosmic reef?

episodes.name: The Doom Funnel Rescue
episodes.overview: When a huge space tornado threatens to demolish a peaceful little colony in the Doublewide Constellation, Jason and the Penguins must save the day! But this "Doom Funnel" is bigger than any they've seen before! Can the Penguins reach the colony before it's too late? And what could Kevin's new little robot friend, B.I.N.G., possibly have to do with any of this?!

episodes.name: Moon Menace on Planet Tell-a-Lie!
episodes.overview: The giant moon of Planet Tell-a-Lie has slipped its orbit and is plummeting down rapidly! If Jason and the Penguins don't act quickly, the entire planet will be flattened like a flounder. But with its people telling only lies, figuring out the truth about what is causing their moon to malfunction isn't going to be easy.

episodes.name: I Scream, You Scream!
episodes.overview: After returning from a mission, the penguins are unable to bring Jason and Michelle back to Grandmum's house as the galeezel is broken. Until it's fixed the kids have to join the penguins as they battle Cavitus, who's plotting to steal the Space-T-Freeze ship. Cavitus tries to thwart the penguins by getting them angry at each other and accusing them for things they didn't do. Soon everyone learns the importance of knowing all the facts before jumping to conclusions.

episodes.name: The Green-Eyed Monsters
episodes.overview: A lesson in envy/jealousy The Penguins visit a small planet divided by a picket fence round the equator and populated by two factions of sheep, each of whom want to conquer the other side. Michelle also has her eyes on Jason's room, which she believes to be bigger than hers. The pervasiveness of Envy causes green-eyed Monsters to appear and eat holes in everything they see. It's only when contentment rules that peace is restored.

episodes.name: Lazy Daze
episodes.overview: The kids and Penguin Crew decide to take an undeserved break from their work and have a picnic on Rigel-13. Jason only too gladly sets aside his duties for play. By the time they arrive at Rigel-13, Jason is a full-on sluggard. No sooner do they set out their picnic baskets, then they are set upon by giant 20 foot tall ants! Escape seems impossible. All clues point to Cavitus. Jason makes the discovery that the Ants are really Rangers, sent by Admiral Strap as a protection against one of Cavitus' schemes. They seemed to be attacking Jason & the Penguins, but were really just cleaning up the mess left from the picnic.

episodes.name: More Is More
episodes.overview: The Penguins are sent to Planet Gutt to investigate a problem in their gravitational field. What looks like a simple matter turns out to be an enormous problem. The entire planet has become addicted to the breakfast cereal, Sugar Frosted Black Holes. It causes insatiable appetites for everything. The planet has become lopsided and is in danger of being thrown off course. Midgel and Fidgel set aside their differences (momentarily) to work together to set the planet aright. Jason helps inform the Gutt citizens that moderation is the key, and that gluttony only leads to ruin.

episodes.name: Give And Let Give
episodes.overview: Michelle refuses to share cupcakes with her brother as the crew heads up a mission to a planet of Garden Gnomes and Plastic Flamingos who are feuding over water rights on their draught stricken world. Michelle sees that stinginess hurts all parties involved, when the dam on the planet is set to burst and destroy everything. She encourages Fidgel and Midgel to overcome their squabbling and share technology that saves the planet.

episodes.name: Practical Hoax
episodes.overview: Jason and Michelle set off a series of practical jokes on board the ship. None of which turn out to be very funny to their victims. Then the crew is asked to act as substitute teachers at the Academy. Jason and Michelle help out and see what it's like to be at the wrong end of a practical joke. Cavitus infiltrates the school in an attempt to defeat the Penguins. Naturally everything comes to a head, and Penguins learn a lesson that a joke isn't funny when it hurts somebody. Cavitus escapes and the Penguins learn that Bert the Hamster and Cavitus are one and the same!

episodes.name: Comedy of Errors
episodes.overview: When Jason takes the stage as a stand-up comedian, he makes fun of his twin sister, Michelle, to get laughs. But when her feelings are hurt, spaceship comrades Zidgel, Midgel, Fidgel, and Kevin must come to the rescue! Can they help Jason learn to be funny without making fun of others?

episodes.name: Compassion Crashin'
episodes.overview: After crashing on an asteroid, Michelle is made the queen of the strange tribe that lives there.

episodes.name: Wiki Tiki
episodes.overview: The penguins go to the island planet of Wiki Tiki, which is in danger from a large volcano.

episodes.name: Invasion of the Body Swappers
episodes.overview: Michelle is troubled, feeling like she isn't pretty. As she wrestles with her outward appearance, she and Jason join the Penguin crew as they head to the MISO GUAPO beauty products convention where Zidgel is supposed to deliver a speech. Through a bizarre Galeezel accident, Zidgel and Kevin switch bodies, and mayhem ensues.

episodes.name: Git Along Little Doggie
episodes.overview: Jason & Michelle help the Penguins crew with a cattle drive on Planet Roo-Tin Toot-Tin. Seems most of the herd has come up missing. But the trail boss, Wild Bill Quasar, is one ornery critter. He has nary a kind word for anybody.

episodes.name: Wise Guys
episodes.overview: Jason gets a time machine. But he doesn't want to listen to the advice from his elders on how to make it work. Because of a glitch, they crash land on a planet populated by three old Penguins, who just like to dole out unsolicited advice. Then they all realize that Jason's time machine did work, and these old penguins are Midgel, Fidgel and Zidgel in future form. Plus, the old guys (because of their experience) are the only ones who know how to repair the ship and the time machine. It's a lesson in listening to your elders.

episodes.name: Hogs And Kisses
episodes.overview: Jason is feeling put upon by everyone. It seems he is being criticized at every turn, so he runs away to be confronted by Cavitus and the Lizard King.

episodes.name: 12 Angry Hens
episodes.overview: Passing judgment too quickly leads the crew to trouble.

episodes.name: Kennel Club Blues
episodes.overview: The Penguins must find the missing pet of the Emperor of Planet Kennel. Jason and Michelle discover the importance of caring properly for pets.

episodes.name: Oh Mercy!
episodes.overview: Jason and Zidgel are thrown in jail when they accidentally break the Crown Jewel to the Gator King of Mercy Falls.

episodes.name: Promises, Promises
episodes.overview: The Penguins take Michelle to Planet "Cross Your Heart".

episodes.name: Do Unto Brothers
episodes.overview: A trip into space leads the Penguins to be captured by the Evil Cavitus. Michelle's attempt to save them leads her down a gummy worm hole and into more trouble. She must learn to treat others the way she would like to be treated in order to save her friends.

episodes.name: Between an Asteroid and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: Cavitus attacks the Penguin ship with his newest weapon (a glue ray), but something goes wrong and Cavitus and Michelle end up trapped in a hollow asteroid together.

episodes.name: In the Big House
episodes.overview: The Penguins find a stranded spaceship. Investigating, they find that the ship is drained of all power and the Cow inhabitants need more fuel.
